GenOO::NGS::Pipeline Job
SummaryIncluded librariesPackage variablesSynopsisDescriptionGeneral documentationMethods
Summary
GenOO::NGS::Pipeline::Job - Job object, with features
Package variables
No package variables defined.
Inherit
Clone GenOO::_Initializable
Synopsis
    # This is the main transcript object
    # It represents a transcript of a gene
    
    # To initialize 
    my $transcript = GenOO::NGS::Pipeline::Job->new({
        ENSTID         => undef,
        SPECIES        => undef,
        STRAND         => undef,
        CHR            => undef,
        START          => undef,
        STOP           => undef,
        GENE           => undef, # GenOO::Gene
        UTR5           => undef, # GenOO::NGS::Pipeline::Job::UTR5
        CDS            => undef, # GenOO::NGS::Pipeline::Job::CDS
        UTR3           => undef, # GenOO::NGS::Pipeline::Job::UTR3
        CDNA           => undef, # GenOO::NGS::Pipeline::Job::CDNA
        BIOTYPE        => undef,
        INTERNAL_ID    => undef,
        INTERNAL_GID   => undef,
        EXTRA_INFO     => undef,
    });
Description
    The Transcript class describes a transcript of a gene. It has a backreference back to the gene where it belongs
    and contains functional regions such as 5'UTR, CDS and 3'UTR for protein coding genes. If the gene is not protein
    coding then the CDNA region is set and the above remain undefined. It's up to the user to check if the attributes
    are defined or not. The transcript class inherits the SplicedLocus class so it also describes a genomic region
    where Introns and Exons are defined.

Methods code
_initdescriptionprevnextTop
sub _init {
	my ($self,$data) = @_;
	
	$self->SUPER::_init($data);
	$self->set_input($$data{INPUT});
	$self->set_output($$data{OUTPUT});
	$self->set_description($$data{DESCRIPTION});
	$self->set_log($$data{LOG});
	
	return $self;
}
get_descriptiondescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_description {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->{DESCRIPTION};
}
get_inputdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_input {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->{INPUT};
}

sub get_log {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->{LOG};
}
get_outputdescriptionprevnextTop
sub get_output {
	my ($self) = @_;
	return $self->{OUTPUT};
}
set_descriptiondescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_description {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	if (defined $value) {
		$self->{DESCRIPTION} = $value;
		return 0;
	}
	else {
		return 1;
	}
}
set_inputdescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_input {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	if (defined $value) {
		$self->{ENSTID} = $value;
		return 0;
	}
	else {
		return 1;
	}
}
set_logdescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_log {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	if (defined $value) {
		$self->{LOG} = $value;
		return 0;
	}
	else {
		return 1;
	}
}
set_outputdescriptionprevnextTop
sub set_output {
	my ($self,$value) = @_;
	if (defined $value) {
		$self->{OUTPUT} = $value;
		return 0;
	}
	else {
		return 1;
	}
}
